languages.text: This item grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}. If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}, all allies gain +{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d}% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against enemies adjacent to the wearer. The wearer automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} allies' melee attacks.

languages.text: 装备者获得+5%{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}。如果装备者拥有{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}自由主义{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}信念{/g}，则所有盟友攻击装备者邻近的敌人时，{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}都会提高{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d}%。装备者会自动{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}所有盟友的近战攻击。
languages.original_text: This item grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}. If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}, all allies gain +{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d}% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against enemies adjacent to the wearer. The wearer automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} allies' melee attacks.

traits.locale_text: 装备者获得+5%{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}。如果装备者拥有“人道主义”信念，则所有盟友攻击装备者邻近的敌人时，{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}都会提高<u>（10+2×“人道主义”等级）</u>%。装备者会自动闪避所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}。

装备者获得+5%{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}招架减免{/g}。如果装备者拥有{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}自由主义{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}信念{/g}，则所有盟友攻击装备者邻近的敌人时，{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}都会提高{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d}%。装备者会自动{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}所有盟友的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}。

languages.text: Увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижение парирования{/g} на 5%. Если персонаж обладает {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}убеждением{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g}, его союзники получают +{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d}% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шансу попадания{/g} по противникам на соседних клетках с персонажем. Персонаж автоматически {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атак союзников в ближнем бою.
languages.original_text: This item grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}. If the wearer has Conviction — Benevolentia, all allies gain +<u>(10 + 2 × Benevolentia rank)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} against enemies adjacent to the wearer. The wearer automatically dodges allies' {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}melee attacks{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижение парирования{/g} на 5%. Если персонаж обладает убеждением Благодеяние, его союзники получают +<u>(10 + 2 × ранг Благодеяния)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шансу попадания{/g} по противникам на соседних клетках с персонажем. Персонаж автоматически уклоняется от атак союзников в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g}.

Увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижение парирования{/g} на 5%. Если персонаж обладает убеждением Благодеяние, его союзники получают +<u>(10 + 2 × ранг Благодеяния)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шансу попадания{/g} по противникам на соседних клетках с персонажем. Персонаж автоматически уклоняется от атак союзников в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ближнем бою{/g}.

Увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}снижение парирования{/g} на 5%. Если персонаж обладает {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}убеждением{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Схизматик{/g}, его союзники получают +{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d}% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шансу попадания{/g} по противникам на соседних клетках с персонажем. Персонаж автоматически {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атак союзников в ближнем бою.

languages.text: このアイテムは使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}に+5の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を与える。使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}信念{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g}を持っていれば、全ての味方は使用者の隣にいる敵に対して+{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d}%の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}を得る。使用者は味方の近接攻撃を自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}する。
languages.original_text: This item grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}. If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}, all allies gain +{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d}% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against enemies adjacent to the wearer. The wearer automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} allies' melee attacks.

traits.locale_text: 自身の{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}に+5の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を付与。自身が信念 — ベネボレンティアを持っていれば、全ての味方は自身の隣にいる敵に対して+<u>(10+2×ベネボレンティアランク)</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}を獲得。味方の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}を自動的に回避。

このアイテムは使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}受け流し減少{/g}に+5の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を与える。使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}信念{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}革新主義{/g}を持っていれば、全ての味方は使用者の隣にいる敵に対して+{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d}%の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}を得る。使用者は味方の{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を自動的に{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}する。

languages.text: Este objeto proporciona al portador una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +5 a la {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g}. Si el portador tiene {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Convicción{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}, todos los aliados ganan +{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d} % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} contra los enemigos adyacentes al portador. El portador {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} automáticamente los ataques cuerpo a cuerpo de sus aliados.
languages.original_text: This item grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}. If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}, all allies gain +{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d}% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against enemies adjacent to the wearer. The wearer automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} allies' melee attacks.

traits.locale_text: Este objeto proporciona al portador una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +5 a la {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g}. Si el portador tiene Convicción: Benevolentia, todos los aliados ganan +<u>(10 + 2 × rango de Benevolentia)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} contra los enemigos adyacentes al portador. El portador esquiva automáticamente los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} de sus aliados.

Este objeto proporciona al portador una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +5 a la {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}reducción de parada{/g}. Si el portador tiene {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Convicción{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclasta{/g}, todos los aliados ganan +{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d} % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} contra los enemigos adyacentes al portador. El portador {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} automáticamente los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} de sus aliados.

languages.text: Dieser Gegenstand gewährt dem Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 auf die {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g}. Hat der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Überzeugung{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g}, erhalten alle Verbündeten +{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d} % {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} gegen an den Träger angrenzende Feinde. Der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}weicht{/g} automatisch allen Nahkampfangriffen von Verbündeten aus.
languages.original_text: This item grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}. If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}, all allies gain +{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d}% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against enemies adjacent to the wearer. The wearer automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} allies' melee attacks.

traits.locale_text: Dieser Gegenstand gewährt dem Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 auf {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduzierung{/g}. Hat der Träger Überzeugung – Benevolentia, erhalten alle Verbündeten +<u>(10 + 2 × Benevolentia-Rang)</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} gegen an den Träger angrenzende Feinde. Der Träger weicht automatisch allen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangriffen{/g} von Verbündeten aus.

Dieser Gegenstand gewährt dem Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +5 auf die {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}Parieren-Reduktion{/g}. Hat der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Überzeugung{/g} – {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ikonoklast{/g}, erhalten alle Verbündeten +{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d} % {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} gegen an den Träger angrenzende Feinde. Der Träger {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}weicht{/g} automatisch allen {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffen{/g} von Verbündeten aus.

languages.text: Ces gants confèrent à leur utilisateur un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g} de +5. Si l'utilisateur dispose de la {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g}, tous les alliés bénéficient de +{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d} % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances de toucher{/g} contre les ennemis adjacents à l'utilisateur. Celui-ci {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} automatiquement les attaques de mêlée de ses alliés.
languages.original_text: This item grants the wearer a +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}parry reduction{/g}. If the wearer has {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclast{/g}, all allies gain +{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d}% {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} against enemies adjacent to the wearer. The wearer automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} allies' melee attacks.

traits.locale_text: Ces gants confèrent à leur utilisateur un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g} de +5. Si l'utilisateur dispose de la Conviction — Benevolentia, tous les alliés bénéficient de +<u>(10 + 2 × rang Benevolentia)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} contre les ennemis adjacents à l'utilisateur. Celui-ci esquive automatiquement les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaques de mêlée{/g} de ses alliés.

Ces gants confèrent à leur utilisateur un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}réduction de parade{/g} de +5. Si l'utilisateur dispose de la {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Conviction{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Iconoclaste{/g}, tous les alliés bénéficient de +{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d} % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} contre les ennemis adjacents à l'utilisateur. Celui-ci {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} automatiquement les {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} de ses alliés.

languages.text: Bu eşya, giyen kişinin {g|Encyclopedia:ParryReduction}savuşturma azaltımı{/g} değerine +5 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} kazandırır. Giyen kişi, {g|Encyclopedia:SoulmarkTypesGlossary}Kanaat{/g} — {g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkHope}Ezber Bozan{/g} sahibiyse tüm dost birimler, giyen kişinin bitişiğindeki düşmanlara karşı +%{uip|Hit|06789f989e894ed28ac63df12c63eb6d} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruş olasılığı{/g} kazanır. Giyen kişi, dost birimlerin yakın dövüş saldırılarından otomatik olarak {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınır{/g}.

The wearer automatically {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} allies' melee attacks.
